EmailTemplate.name: 201907_BK_Webinar_Total_Avionics_Plan_MC.201907_BK_Webinar_Total_Avionics_Plan_M
EmailTemplate.subject: Don't miss out on July 11 webinar at 8 p.m. EDT
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://www.bendixking.com/]]>
<[[http://www.socialflight.com/#reg]]>WEBINARUpgrade to Your Dream Panel with the BendixKing Total Avionics Plan
<[[http://www.socialflight.com/#reg]]>
Date:Thursday, July 11th, 8 p.m. EDT Many pilots dream of upgrading their aircraft with a beautiful, modern and fully-integrated avionics suite that makes flying safer and more enjoyable. However, the one-time cost of a major avionics upgrade can be daunting. Don’t let more time slip by while your best flying awaits. Join BendixKing Senior Product Manager Sapan Shah, along with SocialFlight President, A&P/IA, Jeff Simon for a discussion on how BendixKing’s new Total Avionics Plan <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/pages/total-avionics-plan]]> (TAP) can let you fly with your dream panel today, at a cost that fits your budget. Produced in association with SocialFlight.com <[[http://www.socialflight.com/search.php]]>, your webinar registration includes FREE access to information on over 10,000 aviation events, destinations, airport restaurants, contests and more listed on SocialFlight.com, the SocialFlight mobile apps and Local Aviation Event Planner.
REGISTER HERE <[[https://register.gotowebinar.com/register/7593486086402113037]]>
